sections.heading: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Burial of Dead Bodies Act.
sections.text: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Burial of Dead Bodies Act.

sections.heading: (a) All dead human bodies or the remains of persons interred
sections.text:
in the earth within this State which are not encased in a concrete,
fiberglass, or other similar hardback outer enclosure shall have a cover
of not less than 18 inches of earth at the shallowest point over the
receptacle in which such body or remains are placed.
